UPDATE_NOTES: Due to container limitations, it cannot be updated from itself.
You can update it manually or for example from Portainer.
Detailed instructions are available on GitHub.

CARD.DELETE_CONFIRM: Do you want to delete this host?

HELP.LABEL: Help
TEXT: If you did not mount docker socket directly to the container, then DOCKER_HOST environment variable is required which you can set in docker-compose or docker command.
For the main Tugtainer instance the agent address is http://127.0.0.1:8001 and the secret is undefined by default, which you can change with AGENT_SECRET environment variable.
For remote hosts you have to deploy Tugtainer Agent (quenary/tugtainer-agent) and use it's address and secret in the corresponding fields.

GENERAL.LABEL: General
GENERAL.NAME: Name
GENERAL.PRUNE_HINT: Enable auto-pruning of images after scheduled process.
GENERAL.PRUNE_ALL_HINT: This toggle stands for --all flag of 'docker image prune' command.
GENERAL.TIMEOUT_HINT: Timeout in seconds for typically fast agent requests. It does not affect potentially long requests such as container create or image pull.
GENERAL.CONTAINER_HC_TIMEOUT_HINT: Timeout in seconds for how long the app will wait for a healthcheck during an update before starting a rollback.

CONTAINERS.NAME: Name
CONTAINERS.CHECK_HINT: Periodically check for a new image.
CONTAINERS.UPDATE_HINT: Automatically update container when a new image is detected.

UPDATE_DISABLED_HINTS.PROTECTED: The protected container cannot be updated from the app.
UPDATE_DISABLED_HINTS.NOT_RUNNING: The container must be in running state.

CONTAINERS.MAIN_BTN_HINT: If a container is a part of a compose project, all project's containers will be involved in the process.
CONTAINERS.PROTECTED_CONTAINER_HINT: This container labeled with dev.quenary.tugtainer.protected and cannot be updated from the app.

TABLE.PRUNE_CONFIRM: Do you want to prune images?
TABLE.PRUNE_ALL_HINT: This toggle stands for --all flag of 'docker image prune' command.

CRONTAB_EXPR.LABEL: Crontab expression
CRONTAB_EXPR.HINT:
Crontab expression for periodic checks e.g. 
'0 */1 * * *' for every hour

Click for more info.

NOTIFICATION_URLS.LABEL: Notification URLs
NOTIFICATION_URLS.HINT:
URLs for notifications via Apprise e.g. tgram://<token>/<chat_id>
You can specify several, each on a new line.

Click for more info.

TIMEZONE.LABEL: Timezone
TIMEZONE.HINT: Timezone in IANA format, e.g. Europe/Moscow

NOTIFICATION_TITLE_TEMPLATE.LABEL: Notification title template
NOTIFICATION_TITLE_TEMPLATE.HINT:
Jinja2 template of notification title.

Click for more info.

NOTIFICATION_BODY_TEMPLATE.LABEL: Notification body template
NOTIFICATION_BODY_TEMPLATE.HINT:
Jinja2 template of notification body.
